content: व्रात्यः [व्रातात् समूहात च्यवति यत्] {@--1@} A man of the first three classes who has lost his caste owing to the non-performance of the principal Saṃskāras or purificatory rites (especially investiture with the sacred thread) over him, an outcast; भवत्या हि व्र त्याधमपतितपाखंडपरिषत्परित्राणस्नेहः <ls>G. L. 37.</ls> {@--2@} A low or vile person in general. {@--3@} A man of a particular inferior tribe (the descendant of a Śūdra father and Kṣatriya mother). --त्या The daughter of an outcast.
